body: Dozens of people in Sudan, many of them university students, who were arrested after participating in the protests that started on 30th January are still under detention.
original_body: Dozens of people in Sudan, many of them university students, who were arrested after participating in the protests that started on 30th January are still under detention.
title: Sudan: Protesters still under detention

sentence: Dozens of people in Sudan, many of them university students, who were arrested after participating in the protests that started on 30th January are still under detention.
